text: Baldur Benedikt von Schirach (9 May 1907 â€“ 8 August 1974) was a Nazi who led the Hitler-Jugend (HJ, Hitler Youth). He was also the Gauleiter and Reichsstatthalter ("Reich Governor") of Vienna. He was convicted of war crimes at the Nuremberg Trials. == Related pages == * Hitler Youth * War crimes * Nuremberg Trials * World War II * The Holocaust Category:1907 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Gauleiters Category:German prisoners Category:German war criminals Category:Holocaust perpetrators Category:Members of the Reichstag (Nazi Germany) Category:Members of the Reichstag (Weimar Republic) Category:Nazi leaders Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Politicians of the Nazi Party
title: Baldur von Schirach
